::Dollen::

"What would the two plasma rifles with flame throwers, five plasma
rifles with grenade launchers, all 48 normal plasma rifles, the engraved
plasma rifle, 10 sawed off pulse rifles, the holo-sculpture of G1
Megatron, 60 Marc 5 fusian pistols with extended ammo clips, the
engraved Marc 1, 20 Reaper Cascade heavy rifles, 10 Electromagnetic
bazookas, all 14 stelth cloaks, 200 EMP grenades, the back mounted
missile launcher, 10 chain guns, and 15 drums of Cybertronium Ale run
us?"
